title: Kansas beats UNC to win National Championship
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the Men’s National Championship as Kansas comes back down 15 points to beat UNC. What fueled the epic comeback for the Jayhawks in the 2nd half? We breakdown that ending and more. Also, Tiger looked great during a practice round at Augusta and is progressing towards playing more than a year after his car accident. We go all in on the hype around his big return. Ben Simmons out for at least the regular season, why coming back for the play-in game is worst case scenario for the Nets. And with 4 games left, we breakdown how the East and the West will shake out and who wins the MVP. Lots will be decided in the last week of the season. All that and more…
